name: url_shortener_project
description: ðŸ“Œ Node URL Shortener :- A simple URL Shortener Web Application built using Node.js (without Express), HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project demonstrates how to:  - Serve static files using Node.js HTTP module  - Handle GET & POST requests manually  - Store data in a JSON file  - Create custom shortcodes  - Redirect short URLs to original URLs  - Fetch and display stored links in frontend
